config.ToolbarArrangement.name: Toolbar Arrangement
config.ToolbarArrangement.description: Lay bars out horizontally, or stack bars vertically
config.ToolbarRowCount.name: Toolbar Row Count
config.MultiShift.name: Multi-Shift
config.MultiShift.description: Hotkey to shift multiple rows at once.
config.MultiShiftRowCount.name: Multi-Shift Row Count
config.MultiShiftRowCount.description: Number of rows to shift at once when using multi-shift, if less than toolbar size.
config.HideToolbarItemBoxes.name: Hide Toolbar Boxes
config.HideToolbarItemBoxes.description: Do not show the boxes behind each item (except for the selected item)
config.HideToolbarBackground.name: Hide Toolbar Background
config.HideToolbarBackground.description: Do not show the toolbar UI background.
